website_summaries.verdict: A great value-size mass gainer with a pleasant, subtle chocolate taste.
pros: Combines a variety of carbs, nutrients, and calories for the maximum level of mass building in a single serving
Can be used in a variety of ways such as blending into a drink or recipe for more natural consumption
cons: Results tend to vary from person to person

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate milk. Good
customer_reviews.text: Taste great. I love this stuff. This is my 3 or 4th. I also used HEMP GAINER tablets. They give me a appetite. And with this I went from 118 to 134 in 4mths.
customer_reviews.author: MSClaudette

customer_reviews.title: Best mass gainer/protein shake I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best mass gainer/protein shake I've tried. Tastes great. It does take a little more effort to mix in with water or milk, but once it's mixed in it doesn't have a chalky texture at all which is really nice. It mixes A LOT easier with warm/room temperature liquid. So I usually mix it with a half room temp water and then fill the rest with milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It provides exactly what it's meant to provide. Unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: It provides exactly what it's meant to provide. Unfortunately needing 6 scoops to get the 1000 calories and 40g of protein is nearly impossibly to mix well with a blender bottle so it isn't weirdly chunky, you gotta use a blender unless you're also taking it with a ton of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, doesn't mix great with almond milk.
customer_reviews.text: It does taste great, mixes okay I suppose. I use almond milk instead of water or cow's milk so that could be the problem, but even after a solid two minutes of vigorous shaking in the blender ball bottle there are still clumps. And unfortunately if you do the half serving at a time there's actually less protein and fewer calories than the half serving size of the non-gainer from this brand, and when it comes down to volume of protein it makes it the same amount of protein for less.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Boggioni

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: If you're worried about how this tastes, don't be. I came from using the God aweful GNC stuff and Body Fortress mixes are by superior in flavor. As for the results, I've seen about 15lb. gain in mass since staring this winter of 2019. I dont hit the gym as some of those gym bros, but id say I average 3- 4 days a week and spend 40 minutes - ~1 hours time. f course my workouts are intensive and i watch what I eat.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto B

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong at this price
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great at a fantastic price. I have always purchase expensive or pretty expensive brands, and I like this better than 90% of them. You can't go wrong. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a mass gainer to help me gain 15 -20 lbs. Ive been working out consistently for the last few months and over the last 2 weeks since i began using this once a day I've gained 6 lbs. Good stuff. Only negative is it wont fully mix if you use too much liquid.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and balance of calories, carbs  and protein (BCAAs)
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several protein powders (drinks) and this is my favorite for taste and balance. I prefer the chocolate flavor mixed in milk for an after exercise drink along with additional BCAA and GLUTAMINE capsules. I am seventy-eight and work out three times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add Carbs to Diet
customer_reviews.text: I am Gluten intolerant and it is hard to get my Carbs up! I do just 1 of these 3 scoop Servings a day and it boosts my carb intake right to where it needs to be for the goals that I'm looking to achieve! I love that these Products do have the Certified Gluten Free symbol on them so I don't have to read the ingredients to see if I can have it or not!
customer_reviews.author: BlaineSaysAloha

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for someone wanting to gain weight/muscle
customer_reviews.text: Great product, tastes great to me, have really seen major results in just a month and a half of adding this to my 5 day a week workout/diet routine. Excellent way to add more protein and calories to your diet when trying to lean/cut up, gain weight/muscle like myself. I drink mine after my morning workout. TIP- add hot water to mix it with, its mixes much easier, and can put in fridge while working out. Drink after!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hull

customer_reviews.title: Really does taste pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously one of the better tasting protein powders. I've had cheap generic chocolate syrup that didn't taste as good. Of course it doesn't taste as good as good chocolate syrup, but it definitely good enough that you don't have to struggle to get it down. Add banana and peanut butter and it's actually very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: tastes like diet chocolate - and clunks up
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why the 2lb product tastes like actual chocolate, and this tastes so bad.... It also doesn't break up as much as their 2lb one - there are little chunks when I mix with water.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Kagan

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of purchasing this product??
customer_reviews.text: This mass gainer is very important to me as I lean more on the skinny side. The flavor is very good tasting! Downside is that the shake becomes SO THICK because you need to add 6 scoops! In addition, a FULL glass of milk to mix it all up. FYI blending the contents altogether is STRONGLY recommend or else you will get nasty clumps of powder and it will not be pleasant (I know this from experience). Other than that, very good tasting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I have gained 5 lbs in a month
customer_reviews.text: Only been using a month I was very ill and lost 12 lbs and I have gained 5 back and Im at 105 so I was at 100. Im excited, I have started going to the gym and lifting and still able to maintain and be healthy cant wait to reach my goals!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Moore

customer_reviews.title: No issues yet
customer_reviews.text: I only give it 4 stars because I am not a health nut and use it enough or workout enough to worry about my physical form. But it makes me feel better after workouts so I feel good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes great with milk. Definitely hard to do full serving but half or one scoop is perfect for 16 Oz.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Gunnarson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks i love it
customer_reviews.text: This actually works for me it makes me hungry which makes me gain more weight from eating more and this has the best taste ever!! i add almond milk and bananas 😭😭😭😭😭😭 chile i be in heaven this is literally a snack to me
customer_reviews.author: Tarot Card Reader

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great I suffer frm anxiety and lose weight during those really anxious moments. I use this product as a food supplement goes down easy as liquid
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for 4 months now. Great after 30 or 45 min workout everyday. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Little bit clumpy 8/10
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it a full 10/10 if the powder could break down just a little bit more. Little bits of powder junks here and there but it’s manageable
customer_reviews.author: DyLaN

customer_reviews.title: Great mass gainer
customer_reviews.text: We have tried many weight gainers for my husband and this product really helps and taste good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love BF products!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and it works when used correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Black Light Org

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son using this whole working out he is satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is great. I don't eat well but this product has ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 69 and I went from 117 to 131 in 6 to 7 mo. The taste is great. I don't eat well but this product has helped me regained lost weight and I feel a lot better. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Devillier

customer_reviews.title: worth your pay
customer_reviews.text: this is great for gaining weight. i’ve seen a difference in my weight happen very fast. within 2 days i already gained 3pounds. the flavor could definitely be better.
customer_reviews.author: aah.

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: My order came with a broken seal and powder everywhere. Not a good first impression, at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking this gainer. The serving size is kinda monstrous, but I break it down into 4 equal portions for the 1200 plus calories and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this to gain weight and loves it. Love the flavor and how easy it is to make
customer_reviews.author: Elizabethesa

customer_reviews.title: Item was already open upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: This product was opened when I received it. As you can see there is clear discoloring from where the container wasn’t sealed. This is the first time I have received an item in this condition but I am very unhappy as it is a food product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Capone

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, good texture, but give me HOT diarrhea if i drink it too quick
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Helped me put on some weight these past few months. Has a great taste compared to some of the other protein powders. However, it has made my farts a lot smellier than usual
customer_reviews.author: Seb Slagel

customer_reviews.title: The drink is a little thick
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good but the drink is a little thick so mix it with more liquid so it’s better to drink!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Khalil

customer_reviews.title: The product is ordered automatically I don’t even know why but just stop it
customer_reviews.text: The product is ordered automatically I don’t even know why but just stop it
customer_reviews.author: Hakan

customer_reviews.title: Went from 180 to 193
customer_reviews.text: This product will give you size. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Randy M.

customer_reviews.title: I fractures my shoulder in two places and was useless for a month
customer_reviews.text: It works! I fractures my shoulder in two places and was useless for a month. Pretty much in bed for 4 weeks. Normal is 102 lbs and needed to go to 102 lbs. I was eating my face off and that felt terrible, and still didn't feel like i was putting any lbs back on. I couldn't work out for 6 months as well. And actually i am at 106, so now i need to go back 4 lbs! I gave it to is my son the rest, so no money wasted. Most surprisingly the flavor is REALLY GOOD. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been drinking this for a month like 3times a week still not gaining weight
customer_reviews.text: Been drinking this for a month like 3times a week still not gaining weight,i feel like im losing 😂 I blend this with any kind of fruit most of the time banana if i dont have banna i do apple and instead of water i used fresh milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used the minimum recommended and only got about 3 wks out of it
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a month with the supply I got. I used the minimum recommended and only got about 3 wks out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, I really feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: Works Great, I really feel the difference. Taste is great until the aftertaste but, that is to be expected with any Mass gainer or protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as their Advanced Whey
customer_reviews.text: I love Body Fortress powders (one of the least amount of toxins on the market) but this one wasn’t good for my body constitution. I would get heart palpitations and shortness of breath for 30-40 minutes after consumption. Additionally, there is less protein for the 3 scoops than there is for 1 scoop of their Advanced Whey protein. I sent the product back.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: A great help for hard gainers
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, low cost supplement. I have used it extensively and am convinced by the results. You need to calculate your calories and use it to help gain the calories you need to be in a surplus while working out extensively.
customer_reviews.author: Drew RossTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Using for a small child to gain weight
customer_reviews.text: My son has to gain weight. He has gained weight on this. Doesn't taste like chocolate milk, but he'll drink it which is a plus (undersized child). We are literally using it to boost calories and he is gaining. Nutritionist was supportive in our use of this product (with the use of a vitamin)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: great flavor, it worked great for gaining pounds and muscle with regular exercise, take it from me I'm 63 and was hospitalized 4 months and 7 major surgeries and months of recovery, it really helped me get back in shape, price is right
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Best weight gainer out there
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite weight gainer that I have tried. It has a good flavor and its not as chalky and chunky as many other brands. I try to drink 3 shakes a day and its actually a treat for me now!
customer_reviews.author: mptyler

customer_reviews.title: She liked it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. She liked the flavor. She'd use a mini blender to mix.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Gaining to the Max
customer_reviews.text: This body fortress is a perfect compliment to the weight training and conditioning that you need to stay healthy and fit. Need some more flavors and a great benefit.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian Way

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed! pretty disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all, might work for some but not for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Does do as it says
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled this product has helped my son gain weight after surgery...
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tasting protein shake
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many protein shakes trying to bulk up. This one is amazing. Great Taste and it works
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that has a good taste
customer_reviews.text: Finally a product my son will drink without complaining about the taste.
customer_reviews.author: TTH

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came in coffee flavor. Best value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: price was very fare both myself and spouse like the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Received Mass Gainer on time,price was very fare both myself and spouse like the flavor,I gave it a 3 star due to no weight gain as we have gone through 4 of these containers, for myself I would not recommend this product,however my wife likes the product and she wants to continue drinking the Mass Gainer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used daily as I am a hard gainer. Results = 10lbs in 3 weeks all muscle
customer_reviews.author: K1seman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that good of a value. But it tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: PaulTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: So... I'm pretty irritated. This is the 4th container we have purchased and my husband is up MAYBE 3lbs. He lifts and eats. We strictly track everything so I know it isn't from something else. This product just doesn't work. 3 scoops is only 500 cals that is A LOT of powder, the scoops are huge. So it makes him too full to eat, in turn making this nothing but a meal replacement. Which won't make anyone gain. I wish I had went with my gut. Would return but was told I can't cuz it is opened........ Um.ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Body Fortress Super Advanced Whey Protein Powder Mass Gainer, Gluten Free, Chocolate, 4 lbs
product_meta.description: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.Use in conjunction with an intense daily exercise program and a balanced diet including adequate caloric intake.
feature_bullets: Formulated to be the ultimate muscle mass builder
Contains essential nutrients that help in building size, lean mass and strength
It has carbohydrates to repair and renew muscles and enhance post-workout recovery
It is made up of a high concentration of naturally grown BCAAs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
